t: Amazon.com : Xyience Energy Drink Variety Pack, 16 Ounce (16 Cans) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Xyience energy drinks are the ONLY brand that I like. Other energy drinks taste way too sweet. These have just the right amount of sweetness, amazing flavors, and never make me feel jittery. I can never find them in stores anymore, and have never seen the Fuji Apple flavor before.

s: I have no idea why (has Xyience stopped production of this flavor?) but after I had been seeing these everywhere a few months ago, I have been unable to find Fuji Apple anywhere in the greater Austin area. s: I love this brand of energy drink. Where I live it is hard to find a variety. I usually have to get this particular drink in another town. Great taste and provides that needed energy boost. ... I tasted mostly lime in this flavor of Xyience at first. But it wasn't though.
